doc: The pathname to the file with the reference chemical system. Only SDF files with ONE molecule are acceptable.

When aligning atom sets, this parameter gives the mapping of atom indexes to be used for the alignment. First, the comma-separated list of the atom indexes in the reference, then one or more spaces, and finally the comma-separated list of indexes in the input. Ignored when aligning based on isomorphism.
When aligning atom sets, this parameter gives the weights of each atom mapping used for the alignment.

tag: the input/output of chemical objects (e.g., molecular geometries)
